duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate and/or review equipment drawings and specifications for renewable energy system components.
Prepare electrical designs, including calculations and compliance with standards and codes.
Provide technical expertise to navigate permitting challenges in the renewable energy and power sectors.
Develop progress-tracking and completion reports for electrical construction projects.
Prepare technical proposals, participate in business development, and assist clients with project work scopes and budgets.
Conduct field investigations, construction oversight, and quality assurance activities.
Deepen relationships with key clients and establish new client relationships to support significant net revenue growth.
Participate in project teams and provide new and creative solutions in varying settings.
Lead, manage, inspire, and mentor personnel for overall success of the technical team.

education_certification.credential: B.S. and/or M.S. in Electrical Engineering with a focus on electrical
